title: Test Plan
scope: Login functionality with email and password validation
objectives: Validate error handling for incorrect passwords
Confirm successful login navigation to dashboard
assumptions: Valid user credentials are available for testing
Dashboard is properly configured for post-login navigation
risks: Insufficient test data for email format validation
Inadequate error handling for edge cases
strategy: Black box testing with equivalence partitioning and boundary value analysis
metrics: Average time to identify and report defects
